thread.title: BRIEF-Louis Dreyfus Company Says FY Net Income, Group Share, Up 4%‍​

title: BRIEF-Louis Dreyfus Company Says FY Net Income, Group Share, Up 4%‍​

organizations.name: dreyfus company says fy net income, group share

text: March 21, 2018 / 10:12 AM / Updated 12 minutes ago BRIEF-Louis Dreyfus Company Says FY Net Income, Group Share, Up 4%‍​ Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 21 (Reuters) - Louis Dreyfus Company: * FY NET INCOME, GROUP SHARE, AT US$317 MILLION, VERSUS US$305 MILLION ONE YEAR AGO, UP 4% COMPARED TO 2016‍​ * FY NET SALES OF US$43.0 BILLION, COMPARED TO US$40.6 BILLION * FY VOLUMES SHIPPED TO DESTINATION OF 81 MILLION TONS, UP 5% VERSUS 2016 * "ONGOING INDUSTRY CHALLENGES CONTINUE TO PREVAIL, BUT 2017 RESULTS REMAINED SOUND" Source text: ( bit.ly/2DHoTbJ ) Further company coverage:
